name: Space Panik
description:
Sir Damat, we have a problem, asteroids are hitting the ship, we need to re-establish communications so that we can make a distress call to be rescued by other ships in the surrounding area.

According to my assessments, the nearest ship will arrive if we re-established our communications for 100 seconds, so that it can receive our signal and our position. Try to hold steady !

DO NOT forget to destroy any asteroids you see, as they could hit you and damage your ship, resulting in endless interstellar travel and certain death.

Oh and also, there's a gaping hole in the cockpit, astronauts have been ejected into space, try to pick them up when you see them, it might help you and above all they are your comrades.

Good luck sir, stay calm, help is coming to save you.

Realize By Clement, Laure, Tom and Nereis
